registration.agreeTerms: I have read and accept all the Terms and Conditions
registration.managePasswordDescription:
This password will be used for any future logins. Your password must be at least 8 characters in length and different to previously used passwords.

It must meet at least 3 of the 4 conditions listed below:

  • At least 1 UPPER CASE letter (A-Z)
  • At least 1 lower case letter (a-z)
  • At least 1 number (0-9)
  • At least 1 special character e.g. (@,#,$,%,&, ?)
registration.registerContact: \u003cp\u003eHaving trouble registering your account? Please contact our customer service team on \u003ca href\u003d\"tel:137200\"\u003e137 200\u003c/a\u003e Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n
registration.registerDescription: To register please use an email address known to us or used during your finance application.
registration.thankYouDescription: You have successfully completed your registration. We’ll now take you to your account page.
registration.verifyEmailDescription: You should have just received an email containing a one time password (OTP). Please verify your account by entering the OTP code below.
registration.verifyEmailDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
registration.verifyEmailResendText: You can resend the email in {timer} seconds
registration.verifyMobileDescription: You should have just received an SMS containing a one time password (OTP) to the mobile associated with your account. Please verify your account by entering the SMS OTP code below.
registration.verifyMobileDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
registration.verifyMobileResendText: You can resend the SMS in {timer} seconds
